mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and blue on white) announcing Farewell to Goodies [Warehouse] New Years Eve celebration with Stillhouse Reelers and others at the Main street Cafe on December 31. Poster is a template for pole cards. Poster features a woodcut of a musician.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
